catalog_info.title: History of the Study of the Hebrew Bible: From the Renaissance to the Present: Seminar
catalog_info.notes: Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 1425.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: A background in the study of the Hebrew Bible. Recommended also is some acquaintance with biblical Hebrew and at least one of the following: French, German, modern Hebrew.
catalog_info.description: Surveys Hebrew biblical scholarship since the Renaissance, focusing on particular scholars and their representative and seminal works. The central theme is the emergence of and reactions to a historical-critical understanding of the Bible.
